intro: Cyclea racemosa f. emeiensis, commonly known as the Emei Mountain cyclea, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Solanaceae, which includes nightshade plants. The plant is characterized by its slender, twining stems and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. Its leaves are alternate, simple, and often covered with fine hairs. It is typically found in shaded, moist environments such as mountain forests.
